name: Scaling walls
description:
A short puzzlescript game about cubes that stick to walls and can be pushed up them.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=089fa891f47bb027cad4f6df494ebc91

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=089fa891f47bb027cad4f6df494ebc91
